portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: This is personal portfolio and branding site which you are browsing through right now.
achievements: Creating reusable components with atomic design approach.
Using static site generator for SEO optimization. They call it "The Amazing Gatsby".

engineer guide.title: Software Engineering Knowledge Base
engineer guide.description: This was started as personal guidance for my journey to 10x software engineer destination(Only if that place exists). It contains self-learning guidence to become a better developer based on level of experience, references to learning resources and adding personal notes.

greenrush.title: GreenRush
greenrush.description: One of the largest online marketplace for cannabis patients in the US and Canada.
achievements: Created the backbone on the front-end for the shopping experience using React.
Integrated google map API in the checkout for delivery selection.
I was introduced to the agile world with scrum framework.

cloudboost.title: CloudBoost
cloudboost.description: I was mostly responsible with ReactJS on the front-end, and partially responsible with ExpressJS and MongoDB in the back-end. It was a great experience to be hired as a junior full-stack developer.
achievements: Recreated a new authentication process with React.
Refactored customer's dashboard on the front-end.
Refactored back-end payment process with TDD approach.

pinning.title: Pinning
pinning.description: Chrome extension that can be used to pin comments on any part of any webiste's UI. Pins and comments can also be shared with other people who are having similar extension installed in their browser. This is WIP experimental project.
